mapper.sql: FROM seed_batch b LEFT JOIN seed_info si ON si.id = b.seed_id WHERE b.deleted_flag = 0
mapper.select:
SELECT b.id, b.batch_no, b.seed_id, si.seed_name, b.production_date, b.expiry_date, b.quality_report, b.quality_status, b.remarks, b.create_time, b.update_time
AND b.batch_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{batchNo}, '%')
AND b.seed_id = #{seedId}
ORDER BY b.create_time DESC

SELECT b.id, b.batch_no, b.seed_id, si.seed_name, b.production_date, b.expiry_date, b.quality_report, b.quality_status, b.remarks, b.create_time, b.update_time
AND b.id = #{id} LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM seed_batch WHERE seed_id = #{seedId} AND deleted_flag = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM seed_batch WHERE batch_no = #{batchNo} AND deleted_flag = 0 LIMIT 1
